column1: Friends may call at Blaney Funeral Home
column3: from 4 to 7 p.m. Monday. A Parish Wake will take place at 7 p.m. Monday. The Mass of Resurrection will be held at 11 a.m. Tuesday at Annunciation Catholic Church
column4: 401 Gray St. with Rev. Donald Everts officiating. Burial will be in Fort Howard Memorial Park.
